name: Save the Princess (Johano R. Sulfuro)
description:
SAVE THE PRINCESS is an entry for Godot Wild Jam 10. It is sort of a meta-game where you test an unfinished game and find the documented bugs and confront them. The cousin of mine came across the unfinished game that I made, and it came along with this letter.

The theme of GODOT WILD JAM 10 is GLITCH.

Here are tools that I used while making this game:

  • GIMP
  • Audacity
  • BeepBox
  • Krita (I forgot to mention this in my game)

And here are the musics that I used:

Mountain Trails by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Subdue by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

As the Light Fades by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Forest of the King by Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Double Violin Concerto 1st Movement by J.S. Bach (performed by Jon Sayles)
Exzel Music Publishing (freemusicpublicdomain.com)
Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Here is the github page for the game: https://github.com/Raccoon-JS/Save-The-Princess

And source code for the Game Jam version: https://github.com/Raccoon-JS/Save-The-Princess/releases/tag/1.0
